column1: Little Goat Diner////My friend had the corned beef and hash which got a thumbs up
column2: and my boyfriend had the Spanish omelette
column3: which was not at all a true Spanish omelette.  This was more a pile of potatoes and scrambled eggs squished together and had tortilla chips on top!!  Although it's often called a tortilla española
column4: it is NOT supposed to come with tortilla or tortilla chips!  Aye aye aye.  And no
